Title: Requires passengers on school buses equipped with seat belts to wear such belts when the bus is in motion
Summary: Provides that all passengers of school buses must wear seat belts; exempts school bus attendants and others acting in a supervisory capacity from such requirement; requires that drivers announce "Everybody fasten your seat belts" before a school bus is placed in motion; empowers the commissioner of education to enforce such provisions; assigns a school bus attendant to each special needs student unable to comply with the seat belt requirement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the education law, in relation to requiring the usage of seat safety belts on school buses
